title: iddaraNiyil
sahitya:
iddaraNiyil tyAgarAja sadguru svaamik-kiNai evar


anupallavi

  cittam urugi layittu sItA ramaNanai tudittu
citra sangItAmrta dhArai pozhindavar aDilam izhndavar 


caraNam    tanakkena oru payan karudA sakala upakAram rAma
svAmiyai bhajikkum shrI vAlmIki munivar avatAram
manak-kavalaiyuDan bhavap-piNi aghala madhura kavitigaL udavum sattamar
vAzhvilE raghupatiyaiyum nAradaraiyum darishitta uttamar
